title: NFL Power Rankings: Lions, Bills and 49ers surprise early-season risers through week four
text:
Four weeks into the season and we're ready for our second set of NFL Power Rankings. Spoiler alert: the Miami Dolphins are still last, and you can probably guess who's top too.

All the positional changes are from the set of rankings we put out on the eve of the season, so there are some big jumps and some even bigger falls.

Here's who holds the power quarter of the way through the season.

32. Miami Dolphins (-)

Record: 0-4

The 2019 Miami Dolphins might be the worst team of the Super Bowl era, and are rapidly hurtling towards 0-16 and the first overall pick. I hope they know it's going to take more than just a few rookies to fix this lot.

31. New York Jets (down 8)
description: Four weeks into the season and we're ready for our second set of NFL Power Rankings.
